examples.example: 美丽的北京是一座充满历史底蕴和现代活力的国际化大都市。

translate.english: Beautiful Beijing is an international metropolis full of historical background and modern vitality.

examples.example: 我一直梦想着有一天能去北京领略它那独特的魅力。

translate.english: I have always dreamed of one day being able to go to Beijing to appreciate its unique charm.

examples.example: 北京是我心中最向往的美好城市之一。

translate.english: Beijing is one of the beautiful cities that I most yearn for in my heart.
